sentence.Network_en: Objective : To study the effect of housefly larval secretion on the development of Ascaris suum eggs.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 观察家蝇幼虫分泌物对猪蛔虫卵发育的影响.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To understand the inactivation effect on Ascaris suum eggs in urine directing toilet.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的了解新型厕所—粪尿分集式厕所对猪蛔虫卵的灭活效果.
